content: - chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts *1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 2 84 half_double_crochet 56 double_crochet 14 chain-2 spaces r20 - chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts skip 2 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in chain-2 space skip 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts *1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts skip 2 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in chain-2 space skip 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 2 84 half_double_crochet 56 double_crochet 14 chain-2 spaces r21 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts chain 1 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 1 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts *1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts chain 1 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 1 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 98 double_crochet r22 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in the next st dc3tog 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts *1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts dc3tog 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 70 double_crochet note ignore the chain-1 spaces from r21 you are only working in the dcs from r21 4 r23 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts decrease *1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts decrease* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 60 double_crochet r24 - chain 4 counts as 1st tc 1 tc in each st around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 4 60 tc r25 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc decrease *double_crochet fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc decrease* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 12 double_crochet 24 fpdc 18 bpdc note you are putting each bpdc around the fpdc below and each fpdc around the bpdc below for both r26 and r27 r26 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc 1 double_crochet *1 double_crochet bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc 1 double_crochet* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3
